dict.string: Consent to join the Developer Health Research Study.
Now you will create a passcode to identify yourself to the app and protect access to information you've entered.
Thank you for joining this study.
Please try again in five minutes.
On the next screen, you will be prompted to grant access to read and write some of your general and health information, such as height, weight, and steps taken so you don't have to enter it again.
We need to confirm your email address and send you a copy of the consent you just signed.
Are you sure you want to withdraw?
Withdrawing from the study will reset the app to the state it was in prior to you originally joining the study.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue. The app will now close.

This simple walkthrough will explain the research study, the impact it may have on your life and will allow you to provide your consent to participate.This month long study will ask you to perform tasks and respond to surveys on a daily basis.

his study will also gather sensor and health data from your iOS devices with your permission. Collected data may allow researchers, as well as you, to understand patterns and details about back health.
Your data will be encrypted and sent to a secure database, with your name replaced by a random code.
Your coded study data will be used for research by Stanford and may be shared with other researchers approved by Stanford.
Your participation in this study will take a few minutes per day for one month. You can continue to use the app afterwards to further learn about and improve your back health.
Some of the tasks in this study will require you to answer survey questions about your health and lifestyle.
We will ask you to complete active tasks that may require physical activity.
You may withdraw your consent and discontinue participation at any time.
The information collected by this study may help you better understand and monitor your back health.
If some questions make you uncomfortable, you can skip them. Participating in this study may change how you feel. You may feel more tired, sad, energized, or happy.
Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.
